author: Stacey Patton
title: The pathology of American racism is making the pathology of the coronavirus worse - The Washington Post
description: The pathology of American racism is making the pathology of the coronavirus worse The Washington Post Coronavirus: Why has the virus hit African Americans so hard? BBC News Coronavirus in black America: Living in the eye of a 'perfect storm' CNN Coronavirus d…
content:
Even President Trump has noticed. Why is it that the African American community is so much, you know, numerous times more than everybody else? he asked on Tuesday, adding: It doesnt make sense, and I dont like it.
But the answer to Trumps question is obvious… [+10329 chars]
